title: Rep. Richmond Statement on Historic Settlement with BP (Cedric Richmond)
text: ( Source : Cedric Richmond ) Washington , DC- Today , Rep. Richmond issued the following statement after the Department of Justice ( DOJ ) announced the filing in federal court of the $18.7 billion settlement agreement with BP to resolve claims
